title: The staff shortage slowing down air cargo and bags
description: A lack of skilled cargo handlers is now hampering the booming air freight business too.

title: Netflix cuts 300 more jobs after subscriptions fall
description: In April the streaming giant reported its first subscriber loss in more than a decade.

title: New Tesla factories losing billions of dollars, Musk says
description: Elon Musk said the Covid-19 lockdown in Shanghai was "very difficult" for the electric car maker.
